response.overview: Carmen invites Kathleen over to her house to spend the night. Impressed by the new girl, Carmen worries that some of her bedtime routine will seem uncool and is relieved when Kathleen lets her in on a secret. This moment in time aims to capture the profound intimacy and immediate infatuation that children experience at the start of a budding friendship, and aspires to explore how close this can be to a true love affair. Your first best friend: the ups and downs, the longing, the fall-outs, always reconciling, the pain, forever to be chased in adulthood.
response.title: Kathleen
